person.persName: William K. Thomas (Jailer of Jefferson Co.)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, jailer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Thomas. Father of Catharine Thomas, Mary Thomas, Henry C. Thomas, Ellen Thomas, and William K. Thomas. Owned eleven enslaved persons in 1850. Arrested and charged with being a member of the "Sons of Liberty" in August, 1864.
